TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 763
TEI.2.document_recipient: Sam C. Carter and Benjamin Fowler
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Sam C. Carter and Benjamin Fowler, 04-13-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 763

div1.p: Mr. Sam C. Carter and Benjamin Fowler
Please let Mr Aylett C. Buckner have forty pounds of Tobacco on my account and oblige yours etc
Received of N. K. Rogene fifty pounds of tobacco for order at fifty Cents pr lb on April 14th 1924
